title: 14 day Banned copy paste prelobby player name?
body:
I'm a fairly respected individual for not being toxic/rude or disrespectful in my games and irl. I copied and paste joining lobby information to prove to someone that I called a role before someone else. And one of those players happened to say something rude and their name was fairly rude. However I am the one to receive a 14-day suspension:
What most worries me is getting back to Honor level 3

https://imgur.com/qx8Rgpt
https://imgur.com/zcSForT
https://imgur.com/R7bAumV

replies.body:
Lodge a support ticket with Riot, should be able to get that overturned (and get them to change his summoner name).
As far as their automated system is concerned you were being homophobic, it doesn't know you were copying and pasting.

Just tried to login for a support ticket and it says I must login first even when i'm logged in. I've relogged and restarted and everything. Still says this.
https://imgur.com/a/m8lv97s

Seras comment in this link may help you.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/xowmxp07-cant-submit-support-ticket?comment=0001
I'll try again in a while. Thank you for suggesting the ticket system to me.
Yeah it's pretty buggy - I've found using another browser helps. Otherwise try clearing out your cache and rebooting your browser.

> [{quoted}](name=HushNowGregory,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=mGkF56lt,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-28T03:41:20.240+0000)
>
> Just tried to login for a support ticket and it says I must login first even when i'm logged in. I've relogged and restarted and everything. Still says this.
> https://imgur.com/a/m8lv97s

Looks like you are logged-in on your boards account but not your support account. They are separated.

https://postimg.cc/image/f707zsps1/

If you look at the top right you will see that it shows me logged-in twice.

https://tinyurl.com/y8m9klkf

So I just had the issue that you are having: If you have logged-in on the Boards.oce first it for some reason bugs up the log-in of support.
I logged-out of boards.oce and then was able to log-in on support and then logged-in on boards.oce to have it both work.

Wtf, that shouldn't of gotten you banned. Goes to show how flawed the system is. It is based off of reports for automation. 

Send in a support ticket and you'll be unbanned, most likely.
riot's system is perfect, its never wrong, riot won't see a need to overturn the system's judgement. they've ignored people before, why would they stop now.
It isn't perfect, It's automated. It bans anyone who says like 2 swear words that got reported by more than 2 people from your team.

I'm pretty sure he just said he got un-banned.

> I was about to login to screenshot to show you the evidence. Unfortunately I cannot do that as my account has been revoked (un-suspended)

From the looks of your screenshots: I notice that the scroll-bar (on the right there); there is no screenshot of the text around the middle part of the wall of text. Seems like you are not showing the full truth there.

https://bitport.io/?a=sd9yM9

It was talk about the meta change in bot lane and random talk about % wins with bot lane comp styles. I was about to login to screenshot to show you the evidence. Unfortunately I cannot do that as my account has been revoked (un-suspended) but it mostly me pulling random statistics from my head to say what I reckon win rates would be with strange combo's
